scripts.preversion: bash -lc 'set -euxo pipefail; pnpm i --frozen-lockfile --ignore-workspace; pnpm -C example i --no-frozen-lockfile --ignore-workspace; pnpm -C example exec eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --max-warnings=0'
scripts.version: echo "version hook: commit handled by pnpm version -m (no tag)"
scripts.postversion: echo "postversion: skip pushing/tags (tag after merge on main)"
scripts.release:changelog: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; if [ -f CHANGELOG.md ]; then git add CHANGELOG.md; V=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version"); if ! git commit -m "chore(release): prepare v$V"; then if git status | grep -q "nothing to commit"; then echo "No changes to commit"; else echo "git commit failed"; exit 1; fi; fi; else echo "No CHANGELOG.md, skipping"; fi'
scripts.release:tag: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; [ "$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)" = main ] || { echo "Error: run on main"; exit 1; }; V=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version"); git tag v$V -m "Release $V"; git push origin v$V'
scripts.release:tag:signed: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; [ "$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)" = main ] || { echo "Error: run on main"; exit 1; }; V=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version"); git tag -s v$V -m "Release $V"; git push origin v$V'
